租.definition: to hire; to rent; to charter; to rent out; to lease out; rent; land tax

租佃.definition: to rent out one's land (to tenant farmers)

租地.definition: to rent land; to lease farmland

租用.definition: to lease; to hire; to rent (sth from sb)

租界.definition: foreign concession, an enclave occupied by a foreign power (in China in the 19th and 20th centuries)

租稅.definition: taxation; in former times, esp. land tax

租船.definition: to charter a ship; to take a vessel on rent

租讓.definition: to lease out; to rent (one's property out to sb else)

租賃.definition: to rent; to lease; to hire
